mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zk_dubbo_service_node ( service_id, interface_name, version, address, registration_time, last_heartbeat_time, is_online, is_healthy, last_sync_time, gmt_created, gmt_modified ) VALUES ( #{serviceId}, #{interfaceName}, #{version}, #{address}, #{registrationTime}, #{lastHeartbeatTime}, #{isOnline}, #{isHealthy}, #{lastSyncTime}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE interface_name = VALUES(interface_name), version = VALUES(version), registration_time = VALUES(registration_time), last_heartbeat_time = VALUES(last_heartbeat_time), is_online = VALUES(is_online), is_healthy = VALUES(is_healthy), last_sync_time = VALUES(last_sync_time), gmt_modified = VALUES(gmt_modified)

INSERT INTO zk_dubbo_service_node ( service_id, interface_name, version, address, registration_time, last_heartbeat_time, is_online, is_healthy, last_sync_time, gmt_created, gmt_modified ) VALUES
( #{item.serviceId}, #{item.interfaceName}, #{item.version}, #{item.address}, #{item.registrationTime}, #{item.lastHeartbeatTime}, #{item.isOnline}, #{item.isHealthy}, #{item.lastSyncTime}, #{item.createdAt}, #{item.updatedAt} )

UPDATE zk_dubbo_service_node SET is_online = #{isOnline}, gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE service_id = #{serviceId} AND address = #{address}
